title: Authority and rebellion
creator_contributor_role: Learning Corporation of America, production company
subject_group: Literature/American literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Episode of Series "Great Themes of Literature". This specially edited version of the film adapted from Herman Wouk's The Caine Mutiny explores the first half of the novel - the events leading up to the mutiny. As in the novel, the film focuses on a young naval officer who has been taught to revere authority, but faced with an authority that has abnegated its responsibilities, goes along with the rebellion.
